pages.text: $(#630000)These enchantments can be applied to a $(l:vagrant/factory)Factory$(). Each one changes the resulting spawned parasite into a special variated one, if applicable. These enchantments are all mutually exclusive.

pages.title: Virulent
pages.text: $(#630000)This enchantment corresponds to the Virulent parasite variant, which causes the afflicted to apply Viral on contact or when dealing damage. This is a treasure.

pages.title: Berzerker
pages.text: $(#630000)This enchantment corresponds to the Bloody parasite variant, which causes the afflicted to draw blood when attacking, and gain near-constant Rage.

pages.title: Breaching
pages.text: $(#630000)This enchantment corresponds to the Breacher parasite variant, which makes the afflicted more adept at destroying tougher blocks.

pages.title: Deviantive
pages.text: $(#630000)This enchantment corresponds to rarer variants present for a select few parasite species. Some of these appear to only be visual, such as the Assimilated Villager. Others are more unique, like the Pale Primitive Reeker or Tyrant Adapted Longarms, presenting differing combat effectiveness, specializations, or behavior. This is a treasure.

pages.title: Defiled
pages.text: $(#630000)Causes Rupters to place 'water' when hurt.$(br2)Don't ask.
